snippet.title: Darkest Dungeon II - Kingdoms Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
#darkestdungeon #darkestdungeon2 #kingdoms

Introducing Kingdoms - a FREE stand alone campaign game mode coming to Darkest Dungeon II later this year.

This new game mode challenges you to protect and nurture your Kingdom by defending safe havens and purging dangerous environments of insidious threats. Upgrade Inns to bolster defenses, embark on unique quest lines, and fight back against 3 new monster factions - The Coven, Beastmen and Crimson Courtiers. 

Sign up for our newsletter to stay updated on our progress: http://eepurl.com/dBZuQf

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1940340/Darkest_Dungeon_II/ 
Epic Game Store: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/darkest-dungeon-2 
Website: https://www.darkestdungeon.com
Discord: https://www.discord.gg/darkestdungeon/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DarkestDungeon
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DarkestDungeon
Instagram: https://instagram.com/redhookstudios
